replies.msg: 美國人你地聽住 呢個結果係無地選擇的 將來的後果就由你地自己去承擔, 我依家突然好想中共嗰種專制暴政突然降臨到美國人身上 睇住佢地大呼小叫 然後我只會瘋狂恥笑 落井下石咁指住佢地黎笑

replies.msg:
You listen to the American, the result of the unsustained choice, the future consequences are borne by yourself. I suddenly thought that the dictatorship of the Communist Party of China suddenly came to the Americans, watched him shouting, and then I would just laugh wildly and point to him down the pit.

雖然想侵贏
但見到佢地崩潰到咁忍唔住笑左出嚟
